question_text:
Question 49
The
 
Mean and variance, respectively, of a binomial distribution for n independent trials with the 
probability of success as p, are

(

np,np 1-2p

explanation_text:
Sol.
 
Binomial distribution,

Mean = np
Variance = npq = np (1 – p)
